title: Mueller On Obstruction of Justice, Trade and 2020
itunes:title: Mueller On Obstruction of Justice, Trade and 2020
description:
Kevin spoke with Terry Sullivan, Partner at Firehouse Strategies Public Relations firm and A.B. Stoddard, Associate Editor & Columnist at RealClearPolitics about the reaction to Special Counsel Robert Mueller's remarks that he couldn’t reach a conclusion on whether President Donald Trump obstructed justice. They also discussed the Trump administration's trade policy and effect on the 2020 presidential campaign. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
